name: Panic at the Haunted Hotel
description:
You are a spirit trying to exorcide ghosts.

Destroy all arcane chandeliers to free the area from the ghosts.

There are only 3 levels, but they're quite challenging.

Controls: WASD - Movement

Remarks:

1. Don't let the ghosts get you.
2. Everytime you get a chandelier, you lose that area.
